Title: In the Aisles
Writer: Clemens Meyer (short story), Clemens Meyer (screenplay), Thomas Stuber (screenplay)
Actors: Andreas Leupold, Franz Rogowski, Peter Kurth, Steffen Scheumann
Plot: Christian begins to work as a shelf stacker at a supermarket and finds himself in a new, unknown world: the long aisles, the bustle at the checkouts, the forklifts.
